about_the_game:
SurvivalWorld is an open world survival game in which you can take different paths, dedicate yourself to surviving facing creatures and ecosystem challenges, or you can dedicate yourself to building what you want without limiting yourself.

Survival

Make your way through the different biomes of the World, exploring strange areas, caves with dangerous creatures and animals, obtain valuable resources and minerals, all this while ensuring that you do not die of hunger or dehydration. Also, be careful with the temperatures, each biome has higher temperatures. high or low. But be more careful at night, the danger increases

Building

Build whatever you want, from a simple wooden house to an immense stone castle, with a variety of construction materials you can build what you want without limits, with the placement of blocks you will have free freedom to build what you want. In addition to being totally necessary to protect you from outside dangers

Environment

In each biome you can find different types of animal species, from simple sheep and pigs, to golems, ghosts and skeletons, or worse still goblins. You can tame a large number of animals, some of them even ride them. Or you can also dedicate yourself to being a farmer and plant different vegetables and fruits to have a healthy diet.

Research

Each resource, each food, each material that you get, you can research on a research table, where you will leave it while it is researched alone. Once researched, you will obtain points that will allow you to learn new recipes for structures, tools, armor, mounts and more. Additionally, by interacting with the resources in the environments you will gradually get more points.

Creative

Do you prefer to dedicate yourself to creating epic buildings? Perfect, the creative mode is ideal for you, being able to play in the default world or in a completely flat world where you will have access to all the resources, structures of the game, you will be able to build without limit, without losing quantities, or having to worry about dangers of the world. It's just you and your imagination

Taming

The vast majority of hostile and peaceful animals can be tamed, being really useful for carrying things with you, or if you have the possibility of taming some specific ones you can ride them and travel long distances faster in addition to being able to use them as a defense in case you get caught. attack

Days and Nights

The days are long, you have to make the most of every daylight because when night falls, the dangers increase, vision is reduced, aggressive creatures come out while peaceful ones hide to wait for the next one. day, you can always have a bed with you but if you don't... You better be prepared for any surprise

Fight

The guardians wake up little by little, in order to summon them and kill them you must perform invocations where you will be forced to fight with various creatures, in order to obtain magical forces and summon these guardians to end their lives... Who knows? Maybe you get a reward that takes you to other worlds

name: SurvivalWorld

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or better
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It can run in both low quality and high quality without problems
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Start your adventure in a new world, inhabited by different creatures, fight to survive, build what you want, tame creatures, exploring caves or biome and experience their challenges
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Japanese
